name: Replace Desktop Wallpaper
description: Downloads an image from a URL and sets it as the desktop wallpaper.

input_arguments.name: wallpaper_location
input_arguments.description: Full path to where the downloaded wallpaper image will be saved

input_arguments.name: url_of_wallpaper
input_arguments.description: URL pointing to the image file you wish to set as wallpaper

input_arguments.name: pointer_to_orginal_wallpaper
input_arguments.description: Full path to where a file containing the original wallpaper location will be saved
